item.title: Error message using Azure data lake store destination in SSIS
item.description: To be able to interact with Azure services using SSIS, you need to install SSIS feature pack for Azure But even after installing service pack, if you are using Azure Data Lake store destination with file formats - ORC or Parquet, you’ll get this error message: Error message: [Azure Data Lake Store Destination [2]] Error: System.Exception: Java SE is required to use ORC format. Solution as mentioned in the link above is to install Java SE Runtime environment as its a pre-requisite/dependency.
